title: Selling bonds increases money market interest rate

content.prompt: Assuming a banking system with limited reserves, which of the following is a monetary policy aimed at increasing the equilibrium interest rate in the money market?

choices.label: Selling bonds on the open market

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
